name: majel
description: STFC Fleet Intelligence System ‚Äî Named in honor of Majel Barrett-Roddenberry (1932‚Äì2008)

scripts.dev:full: npm run pg:start && npm run dev
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run kill --silent; npm run dev
scripts.dev:wipe: rm -rf .smartergpt/lex/reference.db .smartergpt/lex/reference.db-wal .smartergpt/lex/reference.db-shm && echo 'üóëÔ∏è reference.db wiped (overlay + dock data cleared)'
scripts.dev:bg: npm run kill --silent; mkdir -p logs && MAJEL_LOG_PRETTY=true npm run dev > logs/dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .dev.pid && echo 'Majel running in background (PID: '$(cat .dev.pid)')' && echo '  Logs: npm run dev:log'
scripts.dev:stop: npm run kill --silent; rm -f .dev.pid; echo 'Majel stopped'
scripts.kill: lsof -t -i:${MAJEL_PORT:-3000} | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'üî™ Port ${MAJEL_PORT:-3000} cleared'
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: [ "$CI" = true ] || npm run pg:check --silent && vitest run
scripts.local-ci: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:coverage && npm run build
scripts.pg:check: docker exec majel-postgres-1 pg_isready -U majel -q 2>/dev/null && echo '‚úÖ PostgreSQL is running' || (echo '‚ùå PostgreSQL is NOT running ‚Äî run: npm run pg:start' && exit 1)
scripts.pg:start: docker start majel-postgres-1 2>/dev/null || docker compose up -d postgres; echo '‚è≥ Waiting for PostgreSQL...'; for i in $(seq 1 30); do docker exec majel-postgres-1 pg_isready -U majel -q 2>/dev/null && echo '‚úÖ PostgreSQL ready' && exit 0; sleep 1; done; echo '‚ùå PostgreSQL failed to start within 30s' && exit 1
scripts.pg:stop: docker stop majel-postgres-1 && echo 'üõë PostgreSQL stopped'

author: Admiral Guff
